title: Boku no Kareshi
sinopse:
Consists of 11 yaoi-crossdressing stories.

1. His Younger Brother
2. His Boyfriend (Boku no Kareshi)
3. An Adult and a Child
4. A Captive... (Torawareno...)
5. The Day will Come (Itsuka no ashita)
6. Let's Be Friends!
7. The miko I told you about (Rei no Miko)
8. The Boy Who's Looking At You
9. Dirty games (Yogore gokko)
10. Breast play (Chichikuri)

(Source: MangaUpdates)
